title: PENTHOUSE / PRIVATE TERRCE / FITNESS CENTER & POOL / LAUNDRY IN UNIT /
posting_body: ['PENTHOUSE / PRIVATE TERRCE / FITNESS CENTER & POOL / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / PARKING', 'Listing ID #: 210818', 'Price: $16,500', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0', 'Bathrooms: 3.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,708 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Incredible apartment in the most desirable neighborhood.', 'The unit gets lots of sunlight thanks to expansive windows and soaring ceilings.', 'The sleek gourmet kitchen and luxury bath will simplify your daily routine.', 'You also have outdoor access with bbq grills to entertain, or enjoy some fresh air at your leisure.', 'The building offers a full service lifestyle complete with a newly renovated 24/7 attended lobby, an outdoor pool, fireplace, sun deck, rooftop bbq grills, landscaped courtyard, residents lounge, tool lending library, complimentary Hello Alfred concierge service, parking and more.', "Tribeca is a phenomenal neighborhood featuring upscale restaurants and boutiques that make up it's chic commercial center, while quiet cobblestone streets and impressive loft buildings lend the area an air of tranquility.", 'For showings contact: Adel Talebpour / Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (Cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
